data.text: Yesu nkaaweha rata, nkoona attu o nhakhu cheera aya wo ukumiha isadaka chaya mphacheni Inupa ya Nlhuku,
nkoona tho, opani ashikini amoka amorihaka isenti pilhi.
Nkeera, “Kinouhimeriani wo ikekhiaye wiira alha opani ashikini alha ahokumiha waapwaha attu onkhaye akuminhe muu.
Ukhalhawaya attu o nhakhu ayo akuminhe isadaka inokhuma mu ifaida yo munhakhuni mwaya, nansho opani alha, ni ushikini urina aya, akuminhe ittu yaakhulhuvelha aya.”
Owiittucha akina aari aarerihaka wi Inupa ya Nlhuku mwaha wo urera malhuku athekelhiye inupa ayo, vamoka ni isadaka chikumihiye wa Nlhuku. Yesu nkeera,
“Alha malhuku athekelhiye ishiri onkhaye nnona inyu alha, anoowa mahuku vanohalha aya uhihalha vaa ata nlhuku nimoka vachulhu nikina, kila ittu inoophomolhiya.”
Nkayankoha, “Owiittuchiha, yayo malhove ayo anowa ukhumelhelha iyaakhani? Ni ithikineha yaani inowa unichuwelhiha wiira ikatema ihaaya?”

Yesu nkaakhulha, “Nhiitialhe, nhiwe mwaathepiya. Attu enchi, anowa wiipanga phi mii, eeraka, ‘Miyaano phi Kuristo Moopolhi thanlhiye ni Nlhuku!’ Nkina eeraka, ‘Ikatema ihaaya!’ Nansho mwaattiva nhaatware.
Nhiwe mwoova vanohalha inyu wiiwa mwaha wo ikhoto ni uthemwathemwa, yayo ahothananiya uwa, nansho kuhiwe phi umalha wo chittu.”
Nkaahimeria tho, “Makosho anowa waatakana nimoka ni nikina, imwene chinowa chaatakana chineneru.
Ilhapo inowa utikhinyia chinene ni ikuruna ni mareta. Unowa ukhumelhelha mwaha wo woopiha attu ni ithikineha chulhupalhe chikhumaka wiirimu.
Nansho yayo ahinaya, nnoowa mwaavariya, nkamwaatwarushiya ni urweehiya mu inupa cho unlhapelha Nlhuku ni ujeerani, nnowa urweehiya wo mamwene ni attu o utawara wo nlhatu no nchina naka.
Yeyo phi ikatema inyu yo uhimiechesha Malhove Orera uwannyaya.
Mirima chinyu chihiwe chaathemwa, mena woova wiira nnohalha wiira chani wo wiivaraanga,
ukhalhawaya kinoowa koovahani malhove ni irusho chihinooria uvaanyihiya ni amalhaponi inyu.
Nnoowa mwaapangelhiya ichimwa ni manyanaangoro inyu ni ashilhoko inyu ni manyampwana inyu, ni akina munlhokoni mwinyu eeviyaka.
Kila ntu nowa uvengani wo nlhatu wo nchina naka.
nansho khiiwo ata ikharari imoka mmuruni mwinyu inohalha upotera.
Wo uvilhelha winyu, nnowiichoopolha ukumi inyu.”
“Vanohalha inyu woona iwani yo Uyerusalemu inarukureriye ni amalhaponi, vavawo mmweeke mwaachuwelha wiira uhaaya wo uphomolhiya waya.
Vavawo etu attu arii Uyudea attawelheke umiakoni, attu arii vawani athamacheke, ni ayo ahiri vawani ayo ahihokolhie uwani.
Ukhalhawaya yayo mahuku ayo phi ‘Mahuku o ntwarusho’, Malhove Matakatifu atimirihiye.

Ahothapana manyopani ari veruttuni ni ayo anaamwiha ashaana ashinkani yayo mahuku ayo! Ukhaalhawaya milhatu cho uhuva ni ntwarusho chinowa chaakhumelhelha velhaponi va, ni urushiya wa Nlhuku waawulhuwelhaka alha attu alha.

Attu akina anowa wiiviya wo uphanga, ni attu akina anowa ukushiya mateeka velhaponi vonkhaye, ni iwani yo Uyerusalemu inoowa yaanyikalhachiya ni attu ahiri Ayahudi, mpaka ikatema vanohalha aya utimira.”
“Chinowa woonia ithikineha chinchi wo nchuwa ni mweeri ni ittotwa. Velhaponi, ilhapo chonkhaye chinowa uhuva, wo nipampa no woova nkhito wo iphioo cho mbaharini.
Attu anowa ukomwaa wo nlhatu no woova, awehereraka mwaha unohalha ukhumelhelha velhaponi, ukhalhawaya machiri o wiirimu anowa utikhinyiya.
Vavawo etu, mwaana a Ntu phi nowa awe, awaaka mmahuteni wo machiri ni nthimicho mwinchi.
Yayo vanohalha aya uchokholha, mweemelheke rata ni utheesha miuru chinyu wiirimu, ukhalhawaya Moopolhi inyu ri vakhiviru.”
Yesu nkaahimeria nlhikaaniho, “Nkoopuwelhani mwiri wo nkhuyu ni miri chikina chinchi.
Vanoona inyu miri chiphuwaka, phi nochuwelha inyu wiira mmalha iyaakha vano.
Chiichammo etu vanohalha inyu woona alha onkhaye alha apangiaka, nnowa mwaachuwelha wiira, Imwene ya Nlhuku ihaatameria.”
“Wo ikekhiaye muupuwelheke wiira, ilha iyari ilha khinovira yayo ahinaya ukhumelhelha.
Irimu ni ilhapo chinoovira, nansho malhove aka khanovira mena.”
“Nkhalheke miitho! Mirima chinyu chihiwe chaalhemelhiya ni nikakata no chittu cho velhaponi ni uhapalhiya ni nipampa no iphiro cho mwiilhaponi. Mweettialhaka nenno nihuku nno ninowa
noovarakani thoko nriankho. Ukhalhawaya ninoowa naaphwanya attu onkhaye velhaponi va.
Nhiittialhe etu, nlhapelheke wo uhoochaa, mmwe mwaapatta machiri o uvira rata vanohalha aya uwa yayo malhove ayo, ni weemelha rata uholho wa Mwaana a Ntu.”
Yesu nkaalhokelha yayo mahuku ayo eettuchihaka attu Inupa ya Nlhuku, ni nchuwa veelha aya, aarwaa ulhokelhani uhiyu waari Mwaako wo Mizeituni.
Vaasha aya kila nihuku attu aari apeheriaka Inupa ya Nlhuku uumwiiwelhelhani.
